title: its not fair..
body: i was s4 last season i did rank again and got bronze 3, i didnt mind it i just simply thought i can climb out but i had 4 afk in 4 games and lost all of it and got demoted. its not fair... its not fair.

replies.body: You MMR has been sitting around 1000/1100, the placements just put you in a rank that reflects that.
life isn't fair, get %%%%ing used to it.
If ur gud enough you will climb back.
